description: Black square bottom center with a nautilus type shell lying on its side on top of it; brown tape horizontally across black square with a thinner piece of brown tape vertically over square and shell.
inscription:
Inscribed in black ink within composition, ULC: >> herrliche Hochseit <<
Horizontal line in pencil below image
medium: Oil, black ink, graphite, stamped or printed image on found image
portfolio: From Mein Schwan: Skizzen zu Einem Buch
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Signed and dated in pencil, LC: G Multerer │ 2001
Signed and dated in pencil below image, LC: G Multerer / 2001
title: Untitled (Shell with collaged cross)
